'''13w37b''' is the fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.2]], released on September 13, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20130912164327/https://mojang.com/2013/09/minecraft-snapshot-13w37a/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w37a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w37b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|15547|Structures ([[witch hut]]s, [[nether fortress]]es etc.) don't get saved with the world file.
|;prev
|30796|2 [[Nether portal|portals]] overlaying each other does not render correctly.
|30806|Exception with /give command.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 13w37b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* This is the first snapshot to be released on [[wikipedia:Friday the 13th|Friday the 13th]].
* This snapshot was released on the same day as the [[Java Edition 1.6.3|1.6.3]] pre-reupload.
